entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
